summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Settings & Configuration page (Phase 8). All backend APIs and frontend UI components working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/settings/business returns business settings with all required fields
Backend: PATCH /api/settings/business updates company info (name, email, phone, address, city, state, pincode)
Backend: PATCH /api/settings/business updates tax info (GSTIN, PAN, invoice prefix, PO prefix, financial year start)
Backend: GET /api/settings/system returns system settings with all required fields
Backend: PATCH /api/settings/system updates general settings (low stock threshold, GST rate, currency)
Backend: PATCH /api/settings/system updates date/time settings (date format, time format, timezone)
Backend: PATCH /api/settings/system updates notification toggles (email, SMS, auto-invoice)
Backend: GET /api/settings/backup-info returns backup info with total records
Backend: POST /api/settings/export-data initiates data export successfully
Backend: All settings endpoints require authentication (return 403 without token)
Frontend: Settings page loads correctly at /settings route
Frontend: Business tab displays company information fields
Frontend: Business tab displays tax & legal information fields
Frontend: System tab displays general settings (low stock, GST rate, currency)
Frontend: System tab displays date/time settings (date format, time format, timezone)
Frontend: System tab displays notification toggles (email, SMS, auto-invoice)
Frontend: Backup tab displays backup info (last backup, status, total records)
Frontend: Save Business Settings button works with success toast
Frontend: Save System Settings button works with success toast
Frontend: Export All Data button works with success toast showing records exported
Frontend: Refresh button reloads settings
context_for_next_testing_agent: Settings page (Phase 8) fully tested. All 3 tabs (Business, System, Backup) working correctly. Backend APIs: GET/PATCH /api/settings/business, GET/PATCH /api/settings/system, GET /api/settings/backup-info, POST /api/settings/export-data all functional. Test file created at /app/tests/test_settings_api.py for regression testing.
